00060 atomic_t Comm::ms_next_request_id = ATOMIC_INIT(1);

00062 Comm *Comm::ms_instance = NULL;

00064 
00065 Comm::Comm() {
00066   if (ReactorFactory::ms_reactors.size() == 0) {
00067     HT_ERROR("ReactorFactory::initialize must be called before creating "
00068              "AsyncComm::comm object");
00069     HT_ABORT;
00070   }
00071   ReactorFactory::get_reactor(m_timer_reactor_ptr);
00072   m_handler_map_ptr = ReactorRunner::ms_handler_map_ptr;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 Comm::~Comm() {
00077   set<IOHandler *> handlers;
00078   m_handler_map_ptr->decomission_all(handlers);
00079 
00080   foreach(IOHandler *handler, handlers)
00081     handler->shutdown();
00082 
00083   // Since Comm is a singleton, this is OK
00084   ReactorFactory::destroy();
00085 
00086   // wait for all decomissioned handlers to get purged by Reactor
00087   m_handler_map_ptr->wait_for_empty();
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 void Comm::destroy() {
00092   if (ms_instance) {
00093     delete ms_instance;
00094     ms_instance = 0;
00095   }
00096 }

00099 int
00100 Comm::connect(struct sockaddr_in &addr,
00101               DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00102   int sd;
00103 
00104   if (m_handler_map_ptr->contains_handler(addr))
00105     return Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED;
00106 
00107   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0) {
00108     HT_ERRORF("socket: %s", strerror(errno));
00109     return Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR;
00110   }
00111 
00112   return connect_socket(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00113 }

00115 
00116 int
00117 Comm::connect(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &local_addr,
00118               DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00119   int sd;
00120 
00121   if (m_handler_map_ptr->contains_handler(addr))
00122     return Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED;
00123 
00124   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0) {
00125     HT_ERRORF("socket: %s", strerror(errno));
00126     return Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR;
00127   }
00128 
00129   // bind socket to local address
00130   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&local_addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0) {
00131     HT_ERRORF( "bind: %s: %s", InetAddr::format(local_addr).c_str(),
00132               strerror(errno));
00133     return Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR;
00134   }
00135 
00136   return connect_socket(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00137 }

00140 void
00141 Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr) {
00142   DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler(0);
00143   listen(addr, chf_ptr, null_handler);
00144 }

00149   return m_handler_map_ptr->set_alias(addr, alias);

00152 
00153 void
00154 Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr,
00155              DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00156   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00157   IOHandlerAccept *accept_handler;
00158   int one = 1;
00159   int sd;
00160 
00161   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0)
00162     HT_THROW(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, strerror(errno));
00163 
00164   // Set to non-blocking
00165   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00166 
00167 #if defined(__linux__)
00168   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00169     HT_ERRORF("setting TCP_NODEPLAY: %s", strerror(errno));
00170 
00171 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00172   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00173     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00174 #endif
00175 
00176   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00177     HT_ERRORF("setting SO_REUSEADDR: %s", strerror(errno));
00178 
00179   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00180     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00181               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00182 
00183   if (::listen(sd, 1000) < 0)
00184     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_LISTEN_ERROR, "listening: %s", strerror(errno));
00185 
00186   handler = accept_handler = new IOHandlerAccept(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr,
00187                                                  m_handler_map_ptr, chf_ptr);
00188   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(accept_handler);
00189   accept_handler->start_polling();
00190 }

00192 
00193 int
00194 Comm::send_request(const sockaddr_in &addr, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00195                    CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *resp_handler) {
00196   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00197   IOHandlerDataPtr data_handler;
00198   int error = Error::OK;
00199 
00200   HT_EXPECT(timeout_ms > 1000, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00201 
00202   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, data_handler)) {
00203     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00204     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00205   }
00206 
00207   cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST;
00208   if (resp_handler == 0) {
00209     cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE;
00210     cbuf_ptr->header.id = 0;
00211   }
00212   else {
00213     cbuf_ptr->header.id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00214     if (cbuf_ptr->header.id == 0)
00215       cbuf_ptr->header.id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00216   }
00217 
00218   cbuf_ptr->header.timeout_ms = timeout_ms;
00219   cbuf_ptr->write_header_and_reset();
00220 
00221   if ((error = data_handler->send_message(cbuf_ptr, timeout_ms, resp_handler))
00222       != Error::OK)
00223     data_handler->shutdown();
00224 
00225   return error;
00226 }

00228 
00229 int Comm::send_response(struct sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00230   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00231   IOHandlerDataPtr data_handler;
00232   int error = Error::OK;
00233 
00234   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, data_handler)) {
00235     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00236     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00237   }
00238 
00239   cbuf_ptr->header.flags &= CommHeader::FLAGS_MASK_REQUEST;
00240 
00241   cbuf_ptr->write_header_and_reset();
00242 
00243   if ((error = data_handler->send_message(cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00244     data_handler->shutdown();
00245 
00246   return error;
00247 }

00249 
00250 void
00251 Comm::create_datagram_receive_socket(struct sockaddr_in *addr, int tos,
00252                                      DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00253   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00254   IOHandlerDatagram *dg_handler;
00255   int one = 1;
00256   int sd;
00257 
00258   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0)
00259     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, "%s", strerror(errno));
00260 
00261   // Set to non-blocking
00262   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00263 
00264   int bufsize = 4*32768;
00265 
00266   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00267       < 0) {
00268     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00269   }
00270   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00271       < 0) {
00272     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00273   }
00274 
00275   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0) {
00276     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00277   }
00278 
00279   if (tos) {
00280     int opt;
00281 #if defined(__linux__)
00282     opt = tos;
00283     setsockopt(sd, SOL_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00284     opt = tos;
00285     setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_PRIORITY, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00286 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00287     opt = IPTOS_LOWDELAY;       /* see <netinet/in.h> */
00288     setsockopt(sd, IPPROTO_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00289 #endif
00290   }
00291 
00292   // bind socket
00293   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00294     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00295               InetAddr::format(*addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00296 
00297   handler = dg_handler = new IOHandlerDatagram(sd, *addr, dhp);
00298 
00299   handler->get_local_address(addr);
00300 
00301   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_datagram_handler(dg_handler);
00302   dg_handler->start_polling();
00303 }

00305 
00306 int
00307 Comm::send_datagram(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &send_addr,
00308                     CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00309   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00310   IOHandlerDatagramPtr dg_handler;
00311   int error = Error::OK;
00312 
00313   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_datagram_handler(send_addr, dg_handler)) {
00314     HT_ERRORF("Datagram send/local address %s not registered",
00315               InetAddr::format(send_addr).c_str());
00316     HT_ABORT;
00317   }
00318 
00319   cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= (CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST|
00320                              CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE);
00321 
00322   cbuf_ptr->write_header_and_reset();
00323 
00324   if ((error = dg_handler->send_message(addr, cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00325     dg_handler->shutdown();
00326 
00327   return error;
00328 }

00330 
00331 int Comm::set_timer(uint32_t duration_millis, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00332   ExpireTimer timer;
00333   boost::xtime_get(&timer.expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00334   xtime_add_millis(timer.expire_time, duration_millis);
00335   timer.handler = handler;
00336   m_timer_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00337   return Error::OK;
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 int
00342 Comm::set_timer_absolute(boost::xtime expire_time, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00343   ExpireTimer timer;
00344   memcpy(&timer.expire_time, &expire_time, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00345   timer.handler = handler;
00346   m_timer_reactor_ptr->add_timer(timer);
00347   return Error::OK;
00348 }

00351 int
00352 Comm::get_local_address(struct sockaddr_in addr,
00353                         struct sockaddr_in *local_addr) {
00354   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00355   IOHandlerDataPtr data_handler;
00356 
00357   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, data_handler)) {
00358     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00359     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00360   }
00361 
00362   data_handler->get_local_address(local_addr);
00363 
00364   return Error::OK;
00365 }

00367 
00368 int Comm::close_socket(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00369   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00370 
00371   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->decomission_handler(addr, handler))
00372     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00373 
00374   handler->shutdown();
00375 
00376   return Error::OK;
00377 }

00379 
00384 int
00385 Comm::connect_socket(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr,
00386                      DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00387   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00388   IOHandlerData *data_handler;
00389   int one = 1;
00390 
00391   // Set to non-blocking
00392   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00393 
00394 #if defined(__linux__)
00395   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00396     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00397 
00398 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00399   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00400     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00401 #endif
00402 
00403   handler = data_handler = new IOHandlerData(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00404   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(data_handler);
00405 
00406   while (::connect(sd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in))
00407           < 0) {
00408     if (errno == EINTR) {
00409       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00410       continue;
00411     }
00412     else if (errno == EINPROGRESS) {
00413       data_handler->start_polling();
00414       data_handler->add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00415       return Error::OK;
00416     }
00417     HT_ERRORF("connecting to %s: %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(),
00418               strerror(errno));
00419     return Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR;
00420   }
00421 
00422   data_handler->start_polling();
00423 
00424   return Error::OK;
00425 }
